item.title: Infrastructure
item.description: Implementation of deployment environments to monitor and operate services. Key features Hardware management such as routers, IDC and so on Network management such as firewall, network connection Software management for services and programs Key skills Development of automatic script Risk analysis Network monitoring and analysis skills Process establishment

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Basic Concept Docker provides isolated environment depending on each application. Minimization of affects among applications. Composition of guest OS on Host machine. Each container utilizes Host’s hardware resources such like CPU, RAM and so on. Docker installation In order to install Docker, refer to https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/. Mac OS Windows Linux Installing Docker on Arch Linux You can use yay, pacman to install it.
